name: Race Car City Driving Sim
description: Race Car City Driving Sim gives you the chance to drive a super-fast race car around a deserted city. There is no one to slow you down so you can drive as fast as you like and get the feeling of a racing driver. Practice your jumping skills or just drive as fast as you like, but try not to smash the car up. If you do crash, don't worry, a quick reset will have your racing car fixed and as good as new. Don't forget to use the different camera angles, try the side camera for a cool view.
